mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proj_board (proj_title, proj_writer, proj_content, proj_imagePath, proj_date, proj_disp_tf) VALUES(#{proj_title},#{proj_writer},#{proj_content},#{proj_imagePath}, now(), #{proj_disp_tf})
mapper.select: SELECT proj_num, proj_title, proj_writer, proj_content, proj_imagePath, proj_date, proj_disp_tf FROM proj_board ORDER BY proj_num DESC
SELECT proj_num, proj_title, proj_writer, proj_content, proj_imagePath, proj_date, proj_disp_tf FROM proj_board WHERE proj_disp_tf=0 ORDER BY proj_num DESC LIMIT 0, 3
